column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Now for the brunch items. I came in with a friend looking for the same level of quality. Aside from an exceptional fluffiness in the scrambled eggs
column2: they fell short of even lesser franchise brunch spots. Their hash/potato side was made in the form of a cube
column3: mixing cheese and other ingredients together but it came out with too many flavors mixing and not any specific texture.
